com.bosch.security.util

Class SecurityHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bosch.security.util.SecurityHandler

  • public final class SecurityHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Locator class is provided to getInstance it easy to gain access to the classes in use. Use the set methods to override the reference implementations with instances of any custom implementations.
